description:
Rachel Zegler recently made several controversial statements regarding Donald Trump and his supporters, including those who voted for him and thus causing his recent re-election. Now, however, Rachel Zegler is apologizing for her comments made regarding Donald Trump. As noted via Variety, she issued the apology on Instagram, and explained that she “let my emotions [...]

The post ‘Snow White’ Actress Rachel Zegler Apologizes For Donald Trump Comments appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Snow White’ Actress Rachel Zegler Apologizes For Donald Trump Comments
